attributes.action: Government to fund and provide extra support to all Veterans for help/housing.
attributes.additional_details:
The British people want the Government to address the above issues and treat this as a priority. Veterans of the UK who once swore an oath to protect this Country, also the British people within it, do not deserve to have their backs turned on them by their own Government.

It is of utmost importance to the British people that Veterans are never left homeless and that appropriate housing will be provided for them by the Government.

We want Veterans to have the best help and aftercare possible.
attributes.background:
Provide appropriate housing to Veterans who find themselves homeless. 
Make Veterans a high priority out of respect and acknowledgement of their service.
Ensure that all Veterans have the appropriate aftercare/support that they need relating to their physical and mental injuries.

rejection.details:
We think these petitions call for the same actions that you want to see happen

Amend council housing points system so homeless veterans receive higher priority 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330763

Enshrine the Military Covenant in UK Law 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332503
